snippet: A British worker for the Carter Center, a nongovernmental organization based in the United States, was killed Tuesday night in Juba, the capital, raising to 14 the number of aid workers killed in the past 14 months.
abstract: British worker for the Carter Center, an American nongovernmental organization, is killed in Juba, South Sudan, raising to 14 number of aid workers killed there in 14 months.
lead_paragraph: A British worker for the Carter Center, a nongovernmental organization based in the United States, was killed Tuesday night in Juba, the capital, raising to 14 the number of aid workers killed in the past 14 months.
